| History                 = 
The J.A.N.U.S. organization recruited [[Norman Osborn (Earth-616)|Norman Osborn]], who was restored to his true self and regaining his privileged life style, and used their collective influence to make Osborn their mole within Ravencroft. The group tasked him with helping [[John Jonah Jameson III (Earth-616)|John Jameson]] regain the ability to become Man-Wolf, turning him into an asset. With Osborn's success using [[Calvin Zabo (Earth-616)|Mister Hyde]], the [[Unwanted (Earth-616)|Unwanted]], and [[Ashley Kafka (Earth-616)|Ashley Kafka]]'s clone to manipulate Jameson, they were satisfied with his results. With his task completed, they were free to use the material in Ravencroft's basement for their own ends.{{r|Ravencroft Vol 1 4|5}}
